extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by referring to the provided links to identify the exact versions of each affected system.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the recommended security patch for the identified CVE to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Firewall Rules
extracted_playbook.description: Configure firewall rules to block TCP port 445 at the network perimeter to prevent exploitation of CVE-2022-26809.
